#summary Chinese Touch 1.3 - Manual

= Chinese Touch 1.3 - Manual =
== Lesson Menu ==
<table><tr valign="top"><td>Directly after start-up Chinese Touch will show the lesson menu. Its structure is hierarchical. You can choose from books installed in the directory "/chinese-touch/books" of your flash cartridge. Each book can contain any number of lessons. Scroll the lesson menu by dragging it up or down using your stylus or finger tip. Activate individual menu entries and buttons with short tips. Its naturally and easy to use.</td><td width="60%"><img src="http://chinese-touch.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/tutorial/desmume-screenshot-0.png" /></td></tr></table>

<br/>
=== Lesson Menu: Book Entries ===
Menu entries with a large book icon (http://chinese-touch.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/chinese-touch/graphics/accessories-dictionary.png or http://chinese-touch.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/chinese-touch/graphics/accessories-dictionary-open.png) in front of them are book entries. Books may contain multiple lessons about different aspects of Chinese. Some books do not contain any lessons but a dictionary of words, spelling and translations, that you can lookup from different locations within the program. When you activate a book entry a description about the books contents will be shown on the upper screen and a couple of buttons appear on the selected book entry. See the table below for a description of each of them.
<table><tr valign="top"><td><img src="http://chinese-touch.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/tutorial/desmume-screenshot-1.png" /></td><td>
|| *Widget*|| *Description*||
||open||Explode a book entry and show lessons within that book.||
||close||Close a book entry and hide lessons within that book.||
||<img src="http://chinese-touch.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/chinese-touch/graphics/tiny_clock.png" />||Order word lists generated for the book entry by access time. Longest unseen words come first. Touch this button to change order settings!||
||<img src="http://chinese-touch.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/chinese-touch/graphics/tiny_dice.png" />||Shuffle word lists generated for the book entry. Touch this button to change order settings!||
||#||Order word lists generated for the book entry by occurrence within the book lessons. Touch this button to change order settings!||
||<img src="http://chinese-touch.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/chinese-touch/graphics/center_rating_bar.png" />||Shows the current mean rating of words stored in this book. Allows to generate lists of words with different ratings. (see below)||
||<img src="http://chinese-touch.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/chinese-touch/graphics/bottom_rating_any_active.png" />||Generate a list of words from the book regardless of their assigned difficulty rating.||
||<img src="http://chinese-touch.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/chinese-touch/graphics/bottom_rating_easy_active.png" />||Generate a list of easy words from the book.||
||<img src="http://chinese-touch.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/chinese-touch/graphics/bottom_rating_medium_active.png" />||Generate a list of medium words from the book.||
||<img src="http://chinese-touch.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/chinese-touch/graphics/bottom_rating_hard_active.png" />||Generate a list of hard words from the book.||
||<img src="http://chinese-touch.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/chinese-touch/graphics/bottom_rating_impossible_active.png" />||Generate a list of very hard and unrated words from the book.||
</td></tr></table>

=== Lesson Menu: Lesson Entries ===
Menu entries with a large paper sheet icon (http://chinese-touch.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/chinese-touch/graphics/text-x-generic.png) in front of them are lesson entries. Lessons typically introduce a set of new words, grammar rules and provide text and exercises for practice, though each of those is optional. When you activate a lesson entry a description about the lessons contents or purpose is shown on the upper screen and a couple of buttons appear on the selected lesson entry. See the table below for a description of each of them. 
<table><tr valign="top"><td><img src="http://chinese-touch.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/tutorial/desmume-screenshot-16.png" /></td><td>
|| *Widget*|| *Description*||
||下||Jump down to the last lesson of the book.||
||上||Jump up to the first lesson of the book.||
||§||Display grammar text for this lesson. (optional)||
||<img src="http://chinese-touch.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/chinese-touch/graphics/tiny_book.png" />||Display reading text for this lesson. (optional)||
||<img src="http://chinese-touch.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/chinese-touch/graphics/tiny_text.png" />||Display exercises for this lesson. (optional)||
||<img src="http://chinese-touch.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/chinese-touch/graphics/tiny_lesson.png" />||Generate word lists containing words associated with the selected lesson entry only. Touch this button to change scope settings!||
||<img src="http://chinese-touch.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/chinese-touch/graphics/tiny_lessons.png" />||Generate word lists containing words associated with lessons up the selected lesson entry. Touch this button to change scope settings!||
||<img src="http://chinese-touch.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/chinese-touch/graphics/tiny_clock.png" />||Order word lists by access time. Longest unseen words come first. Touch this button to change order settings!||
||<img src="http://chinese-touch.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/chinese-touch/graphics/tiny_dice.png" />||Shuffle word lists. Touch this button to change order settings!||
||#||Order word lists by occurrence within the lessons word list(s). Touch this button to change order settings!||
||<img src="http://chinese-touch.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/chinese-touch/graphics/center_rating_bar.png" />||Shows the current mean rating of words associated with this lesson. Allows to generate lists of words with different ratings. (see below)||
||<img src="http://chinese-touch.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/chinese-touch/graphics/bottom_rating_any_active.png" />||Generate a list of words regardless of their assigned difficulty rating.||
||<img src="http://chinese-touch.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/chinese-touch/graphics/bottom_rating_easy_active.png" />||Generate a list of easy words.||

||<img src="http://chinese-touch.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/chinese-touch/graphics/bottom_rating_hard_active.png" />||Generate a list of hard words from the users word database.||
||<img src="http://chinese-touch.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/chinese-touch/graphics/bottom_rating_impossible_active.png" />||Generate a list of very hard and unrated words from the users word database.||
||S||Starts the global settings screen.||

== Word Lists ==
=== Word Lists: Settings ===
When you chose a word list from the lesson menu you will be asked how the dictionary entries within the list shall be displayed. When you are learning Chinese you typically want to train memorization of different aspects of words at different times. In the example shown below the user will to try to remember spelling and meaning of Chinese words within the list, so she disables "Show Pronunciation" and "Show Translation" and then proceeds through "OK".
